1. are_iso [altcat_3]

Source [altcat_3]

definition
let C be category;
let o1, o2 be Object of C;
pred o1,o2 are_iso means :: ALTCAT_3:def 6
( <^o1,o2^> <> {} & <^o2,o1^> <> {} & ex A being Morphism of o1,o2 st A is iso );
reflexivity symmetry
end;
